E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 5/26/1992
Subject: Progress of Eddie Guardado
Dear Sir,
Eddie Guardado is doing pretty good at AA New Britain Red Sox!
He has an ERA of 2.42, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/28/1992
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Masayuki Kakefu
